title: Are you a Fully Knowable Object or Colonizing Agent (or both)? Pinker and CS Lewis
description:
Pageau illustrates Pinker's reduction of human complexity, but the problems go deep with Naturalism. We can imagine two groups. Group A of things that "go on their own" and Group B of Colonizing Agents who move objects in group A. How are these two groups related? Are they one group or two? Does Group B exist? We all act like there are two groups and we are in the second. 

Pageau on Pinker https://youtu.be/eqgfgBH0ICw
Peterson and Pinker https://youtu.be/pBylbB7s5Nw
Random Numbers https://youtu.be/SxP30euw3-0
Whitehead on Reason http://www.anthonyflood.com/whiteheadreason.htm
CS Lewis Miracles https://www.amazon.com/Miracles-C-S-Lewis-ebook/dp/B002BY77FY
Weinstein Portal e4 https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-portal/id1469999563
War on Sense Making Rebel Wisdom https://youtu.be/7LqaotiGWjQ
